fields.title: Symptom View
fields.sql:
CREATE VIEW v_symptoms AS
SELECT s.visit_id,
       s.id AS symptom_id,
       d.id AS disease_id,
       d.name AS disease,
       d.value_class,
       cast(s.disease_value AS tinyint) AS disease_value -- note, casting to some integer is important as the max() function is applied to it
,
       s.days_symptomatic,
       s.severity,
       s.disease_value
FROM uploader_symptom s
JOIN uploader_disease d ON d.id=s.disease_id
fields.description: Create a simple view joining symptoms, diseases, and visits together.
